296:1: imāstāḥ khalu punarbho jinaputrā daśa bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ samāsanirdeśato nirdiṣṭāḥ |
296:6: etā daśa bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ sarvākārasarvajñajñānānugatā draṣṭavyā anupūrvābhimukhatvāt |
296:7: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra anavataptahradaprabhavaṃ pravahadvāri caturbhirmahānadīsrotomukhairjambūdvīpaṃ saṃtarpya akṣayaṃ bhūyo vivṛddhamaprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmupakārībhūtaṃ yāvanmahāsamudramarpayati,
296:9: evameva bho jinaputra bodhicittamahāhradaprabhavaṃ pravahat kuśalamūlavāri mahāpraṇidhānanadīsrotomukhaiścaturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ sarvasattvadhātu saṃtarpya akṣayaṃ bhūya uttari vivṛddham aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmupakārībhūtaṃ yāvatsarvākārasarvajñajñānamahāsamudramarpayati |
296:11: tāḥ khalu bho jinaputra etā daśa bhūmayo buddhajñānaṃ pratītya prajñāyante |
296:12: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra mahāpṛthivīṃ pratītya daśa mahāratnaparvatarājāḥ prajñāyante |
296:13: tadyathā himavān parvatarājo gandhamādano vaidalya ṛṣigiriryugaṃdharo'
296:15: tara bho jinaputra tadyathāpi nāma himavān parvatarāja ākaraḥ sarvabhaiṣajyajātīnāmaparyantaḥ sarvabhaiṣajyajātigrahaṇatayā,
296:16: evameva bho jinaputra pramuditāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattva ākaro bhavati sarvalaukikakāvyaśāstramantravidyāsthānānāmaparyantaḥ sarvalaukikakāvyaśāstramantravidyopāyena |
296:17: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra gandhamādano mahāparvatarāja ākaraḥ sarvagandhajātīnāmaparyantaḥ sarvagandhajātigrahaṇena,
296:18: evameva bho jinaputra vimalāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattva ākaro bhavati sarvabodhisattvaśīlasaṃvaracāritragandhānāmaparyantaḥ sarvabodhisattvaśīlasaṃvaracāritragandhasaṃgrahaṇena |
296:19: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra vaidalyo mahāparvatarājaḥ śuddho ratnamaya ākaraḥ sarvaratnajātīnāmaparyantaḥ sarvalaukikaratnajātigrahaṇena,
296:23: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra ṛṣigirirmahāparvatarājaḥ pañcābhijñānāmṛṣīṇāmaparyantaḥ pañcābhijñarṣigaṇanayā,
296:25: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra yugaṃdharo mahāparvatarājaḥ sarvayakṣamaharddhikānāmaparyantaḥ sarvayakṣamaharddhikagaṇanayā,
296:27: tadyathāpi nāma bho aśvakarṇagirirmahāparvatarājaḥ sarvaphalajātīnāmaparyantaḥ sarvaphalajātigrahaṇena,
296:28: evameva bho jinaputra abhimukhyāṃ buddhabhūmau pratītyasamutpādāvatāranirdeśānāmaparyantaḥ śrāvakaphalābhisamayaparipṛcchānirdeśaiḥ |
296:29: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra nimiṃdharo nāma mahāparvatarājaḥ sarvanāgamaharddhikānāmaparyantaḥ sarvanāgamaharddhigaṇanayā,
296:30: evameva bho jinaputra dūraṃgamāyāṃ buddhabhūmau upāyaprajñānirdeśānāmaparyantaḥ pratyekabuddhaphalābhisamayaparipṛcchāanirdeśaiḥ |
296:31: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra cakravālo nāma mahāparvatarājaḥ vaśībhūtānāmaparyanto vaśībhūtagaṇanayā,
296:32: evameva bho jinaputra acalāyāṃ buddhabhūmau sarvabodhisattvavaśitābhinirhārāṇāmaparyanto lokadhātuvibhaktiparipṛcchānirdeśaiḥ |
296:33: tadyathāpi bho jinaputra ketumān nāma mahāparvatarājaḥ asuramaharddhikānāmaparyanto'
296:36: tadyathāpi bho jinaputra sumerurmahāparvatarājaḥ sarvadevamaharddhikānāmaparyantaḥ sarvadevamaharddhikagaṇanayā,
296:37: evameva bho jinaputra dharmameghāyāṃ buddhabhūmau tathāgatabalavaiśaradyāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāmaparyanto buddhakāyasaṃdarśanaparipṛcchānirdeśaiḥ |
296:38: yathā khalu punarime bho jinaputra daśa mahāratnaparvatā mahāsamudrasaṃbhūtā mahāsamudraprabhāvitāḥ,
296:39: evameva bho jinaputra imā api daśa bhūmayaṃ sarvajñatāsaṃbhūtāḥ sarvajñatāprabhāvitāḥ ||
296:40: tadyathāpi bho jinaputra mahāsamudro daśabhirākāraiḥ saṃkhyāṃ gacchatyasaṃhāryatayā |
296:42: yaduta anupūrvanimnataśca mṛtakuṇapāsaṃvāsataśca anyavārisaṃkhyātyajanataśca ekarasataśca bahuratnataśca gambhīraduravagāhataśca vipulāpramāṇataśca mahābhūtāvāsataśca sthitavelānatikramaṇataśca sarvameghavārisaṃpratyeṣaṇātṛptitaśca,
296:43: evameva bho jinaputra bodhisattvacaryā daśabhirākāraiḥ saṃkhyāṃ gacchatyasaṃhāryatayā |
296:55: tadyathāpi bho jinaputra mahāmaṇiratnaṃ yadā daśa ratnagotrāṇyatikramya abhyutkṣiptaṃ ca bhavati kuśalakarmārasuparitāpitaṃ ca suparipiṇḍitaṃ ca supariśodhitaṃ ca suparyavadāpitaṃ ca sunirviddhaṃ ca ratnasūtrasvāviddhaṃ ca uccavaiḍūryamaṇiratnadaṇḍadhvajāgrāvaropitaṃ ca sarvāvabhāsapramuktaṃ ca rājānujñātaṃ ca bhavati,
296:57: evameva bho jinaputra yadā bodhisattvānāṃ sarvajñatāratnacittotpādo daśāryaratnagotrāṇyatikramyotpanno bhavati dhūtaguṇasaṃlekhaśīlavratatapaḥsuparitāpitaśca dhyānasamādhisamāpattisuparipiṇḍitaśca mārgāṅgākārasupariśodhitaśca upāyābhijñāsuparyavadāpitaśca pratītyasamutpādasunirviddhaśca upāyaprajñāvicitraratnasūtrasvāviddhaśca vaśitāmahāvaiḍūryamaṇiratnadaṇḍadhvajāgrāvaropitaśca sattvacaritapratyavekṣaṇaśrutajñānāvabhāsasaṃprayuktaśca tathāgatadharmarājasamyaksaṃbuddhajñānābhiṣekānugataśca bhavati,
296:60: ayaṃ khalu punarbho jinaputra bodhisattvacaryāsamudānayanaḥ sarvākārasarvajñajñānaguṇasaṃcayo dharmamukhaparivarto nānavaropitakuśālamūlānāṃ sattvānāṃ śravaṇāvabhāsamāgamiṣyati ||
296:61: vimukticandro bodhisattva āha - yeṣāṃ punarbho jinaputra ayaṃ sarvākārasarvajñajñānaguṇasaṃcayo dharmamukhaparivartaḥ śravaṇāvabhāsamāgamiṣyati,
296:63: vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - yāvān bho jinaputra sarvajñajñānasya prabhāvastāvān sarvajñatācittotpādasaṃgrahālambanātpuṇyopacayaḥ syāt |
296:67: na hi bho jinaputra śakyaṃ anyatra bodhisattvena ayaṃ sarvākārasarvajñajñānaguṇasaṃcayo dharmamukhaparivartaḥ śrotuṃ vā adhimoktuṃ vā pratyetuṃ vā udgrahītuṃ vā dhārayituṃ vā saṃdhārayituṃ vā |
296:74: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ buddhānubhāvena dharmatāpratilambhena ca daśadiglokadaśabuddhakṣetrakoṭiparamāṇurajaḥsamā lokadhātavaḥ ṣaḍvikāramaṣṭādaśamahānimittamakampanta prākampanta saṃprākampanta |
296:81: divyāśca vastrameghā divyāścūrṇameghā divyā ratnameghā divyā ābharaṇameghā divyā chatrameghā divyā dhvajameghā divyā patākāmeghā abhiprāvarṣan |
296:87: yathā cāsyāṃ lokadhātau cāturdvīpikāyāṃ paranirmitavaśavartino devarājasya vimāne maṇiratnagarbhaprāsāde,
296:88: tathā sarvalokadhātuṣu daśa diśaḥ spharitvā iyameva dharmadeśanā sarvatraiva pravartate sma |
296:89: ...daśabhyo digbhyo daśabuddhakṣetrakoṭiparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ pareṇa daśabuddhakṣetrakoṭiparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā āgacchanti daśadiśaṃ spharantaḥ |
296:90: te ca āgatyaivamāhuḥ - sādhu sādhu bho jinaputra,
296:92: vayamapi bho jinaputra sarve vajragarbhasamanāmakā eva vajraśrīnāmikābhyo nānālokadhātubhya ihāgatā vajradhvajanāmakānāṃ tathāgatānāmantikebhyaḥ |
296:93: sarvāsu ca tāsu lokadhātuṣu iyameva dharmadeśanā pravartate buddhānubhāvena evaṃrūpāsveva parṣatsu |
296:95: te vayaṃ bho jinaputra sākṣībhūtā buddhānubhāvenemāṃ parṣadaṃ saṃprāptāḥ |
296:96: yathā ca bho jinaputra vayamimāṃ lokadhātuṃ saṃprāptāstathā ca daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣvekaikasyāṃ lokadhātau cāturdvīpikāyāṃ paranirmitavaśavartibhavane vaśavartino devarājasya vimāne maṇiratnagarbhaprāsāde saṃprāptā iti ||
296:99: āttamanāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī bodhisattvaparṣat sā ca devanāga...śuddhāvāsaparṣad bhagavāṃśca paranirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣu viharannacirābhisaṃbuddho dvitīye saptāhe vaśavartino devarājasya vimāne maṇiratnagarbhe vajragarbhasya bodhisattvasya bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti ||
296:101: iti śrībodhisattvacaryāprasthāno daśabhūmīśvaro nāma mahāyānasūtraratnarājaḥ samāptaḥ ||
